Package dom.session

Interface Summary
ListenerHandler  
 

Class Summary
BaseComponent Base class for all components (e.g.
BaseFacet Root facet class to provide basic revokation semantics.
CapabilityReceipt Wrapper class to hold data for a DObject<->DObject presence capability request.
ClientView Client View in 'star' topology.
Closure Class to represent an arbitrary closure, or code block.
ComponentDObject DObject subclass that allows message handling to be done by 'components' or 'ingredients' that are abitrary java object instances 'owned' by the DObject.
CreateClientInfo A wrapper class for encapsulating information about remote DObject presence construction.
CreateClientResultInfo  
CreateDObjectData Wrapper to hold data necessary for creating a remote instance of a DObject.
DObject Root class for all distributed objects (objects that live the context of the multipoint group defined by the View class).
DObjectFacet Root class facet for all DObject facets.
DObjectNotification Representation of the View->DObject notification messages for allowing the ViewListManager to notify DObjects about other DObjects arrival and departure.
DObjectRunner A Runnable class to provide the behavior for DObject message processing.
DObjectViewFacet Facet that the new DObject presence provides to the local View object upon construction.
DirectViewAccessFacet A facet class that allows direct access to the underlying View instance.
GroupAdmissionCheck A check of a group admission request.
GroupConnectionHandler  
HomeViewIDFilter An enumeration that returns DObjectID's for those DObjects who think their home ID matches the a given SessionViewID.
Listener Thread to wait for an 'accept' on a socket.
LoadingDObject Represents a DObject on a local View while the class for the real DObject is being loaded (can be an arbitrarily long operation).
LoadingDObjectRunner Code that is run by the thread responsible for loading a new DObject.
ServerView A 'hub' View subclass for implementing a 'star' topology multipoint group.
SessionViewID A Views's (local View of distributed group) unique identification.
SessionViewMsg Class to represent an 'enum'...for associating an int message type with a string.
View Base class for all 'Views' of a multipoint group.
ViewChange A wrapper class for the data sent in a view change (a group membership message).
ViewClassLoader Custom class loader for multipoint View.
ViewDObjectFacet Facet that the View provides the DObject upon construction.
ViewListManager Manager of all of lists associated with the View (group of Views, and DObjects).
ViewNotifyInfo Class to encapsulate notification that View provides to client DObjects.
 

Exception Summary
ComponentException  
DObjectNotFoundException Exception thrown by ViewListManager when DObject not found.
NullFacetException Exception thrown when a facet class is accessed, and it has previously been revoked.
PresenceException  
ViewConnectionException Exception thrown when a joinGroup or leaveGroup is attempted and the View is in an inappropriate state.
ViewProtocolException
